EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Spring Days_Q217.1 Atlanta Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at Spring Days Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.springdays.io]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow at Spring Days Atlanta. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springdays@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springdays@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Spring Days - Atlanta
July 18th 7:45am: Doors Open 8:00am-8:45am: Breakfast/ Registration 9:00am-1:00pm: Sessions 1:00pm-2:00pm: Lunch 2:00pm-5:00pm: Open Space 5:00pm: Networking & Social @ The Pig and the Pearl Restaurant <[[http://www.thepigandthepearl.com/]]>
July 19th 7:45am: Doors Open 8:00am-8:45am: Breakfast/ Registration 9:00am-1:00pm: Sessions 1:00pm-2:00pm: Lunch
2:00pm-5:00pm: Open Space 5:00pm: Wrap-up
See the full Spring Days - Atlanta Agenda here <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/atlanta]]>. Location TWELVE Atlantic Station 361 17th Street NW Atlanta, Georgia 30363
Directions Directions to TWELVE Hotels Atlantic Station from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta Airport: • Exit the Airport and merge onto the I-85 N entry ramp - go 12 mi • Take Exit 249 D to W. Peachtree Street- go 0.2 mi • Continue through the first light • Turn left on W. Peachtree Street - go 2 miles • Turn left at 17th Street - go 0.7 miles • Turn right on Atlantic Drive • TWELVE is on left.
Parking Valet Parking: $28 (Overnight with in & out privileges) Valet Parking: $10 (Event Parking) Atlantic Station Garage: Free for the first two hours; $1 for each additional hour For hotel parking staircase #10 or #16
We look forward to seeing you! The Spring Days Team
